main event: A pale green object shaped like a match flame was observed falling straight down for 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared the size of a little finger at arm's length., The observation lasted for 2 minutes., The object's brightness was described as significant., It was observed falling at a 50-60 degree angle., The object became out of sight due to the horizon.
sighted object: pale green object shaped like a match flame
witness description: Ground-visual, observed by a radar operator.
